title: ZTE joins the Science-Based Targets Initiative - ZTE
summary: ZTE Corporation joins the Science-Based Targets Initiative (SBTi) to establish emission reduction targets aligned with 1.5Â°C limit, aiming for net-zero emissions by 2050. ZTE commits to reducing operational and value chain emissions through technological innovation and comprehensive energy-saving measures.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 334220 - Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing, 517210 - Wireless Telecommunications Carriers (except Satellite), 517410 - Satellite Telecommunications, 541715 - Research and Development in the Physical, Engineering, and Life Sciences
